title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When selecting both P1 and P2 in the Navigator, the Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project menu item is not.
EB: In the Navigator, when selecting both P1 and P2, either both the Open Project and Close Project menu items should be available or neither one should be enabled.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the Navigator. 
2. Select both P1 and P2 projects. 
3. Observe that only the Open Project menu item is available, while the Close Project menu item is not.
